summary: poisons last ten hits until they wear off
descriptionHtml:
history:
I browsed the nexus many times but there weren\'t any poison mods other than reweight mods. I waited for someone to create this simple enough mod too long, so i thought \"why not?\"

details:
I changed the \"concentrated poison\" perk and increased the amount of doses per bottle to 10. According to lore;  let\'s say the dragonborn learns not to spill the whole bottle, apply the poison evenly on the weapon, etc.
this is intended to be used with mods like deadly dragons and on expert difficulty so it might be overpowered.

installation:
put the esp in your data folder and activate it.

other:
there is no reason for this to bug your game.
it may conflict with other mods that change the same perk.
I will be glad if someone includes this to his/her own mod (with credit of course).
any and all feedback is appreciated.
author: kenevir1991
